scripts.postinstall: project_dir=$PWD; modules=( 'xxxxx' ); echo "Notice: updating module "; if [[ -f .gitmodules ]]; then sed -n -e '/path/,/url/p' .gitmodules | sed 'N;s/\n/\$$$/' | while IFS= read -r line; do if [[ $line =~ (.*)\$\$\$(.*) ]] ; then path="$(echo ${BASH_REMATCH[1]} | sed 's/.*= //')"; url="$(echo ${BASH_REMATCH[2]} | sed 's/.*= //')"; if [[ -d "${path}/.git" ]] ; then echo "Notice: git pull submodule $(realpath ${path})"; cd "${path}" && git pull; else if [[ -z "$(ls -A ${path})" ]]; then echo "Notice: git clone submodule $(realpath ${path})"; rm -rf "${path}"; git clone $url $path; else echo "Notice: $(realpath ${path}) submodule folder is not empty, try to remove it before clone."; fi; fi; else echo "Notice: module does  not contain submodules."; fi; done; else echo "Notice: module does not contain submodules."; fi; cd "${project_dir}";
